You've seen this time and again knuckleheads...haven't your learned anything? Load up the truck, Orcl as well!

p1sorell, I agree with you.....Greenspan would make a better English language teacher , rather than an economist. I can never get over when he raised inters rates by fifty basis , during Clintons end of second term...he reason was that he could not understand the impact of an increased productivity on inflation....can a degree be rescinded?. Also who can forget, his remarks we should not be scared of 3 to 5 yrs. mortgages....he was the etiology of the real-estate bubble , along with loose lending policy at low rates
